website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Ferrari Future Cat OG delivers comfort and high-quality design. Users describe its style as sharp and unique, leading to a few of them wearing it every day. Furthermore, the model is highly recommended by several buyers.Those who are looking to buy will have to note that wearers found the shoe to run narrow. At $110, this reasonably priced model from the Puma sneaker range could be ideal for those looking for something distinctive yet affordable.
pros: The Puma Ferrari Future Cat OG is affordable
A lot of reviewers praise the model for its high-quality design
According to many users, this sneaker from the Puma Ferrari series is very comfortable
Several buyers mention that they highly recommend the Puma Ferrari Future Cat OG
It’s a durable shoe, more than a handful of purchasers have observed
A few commenters share that they wear the kicks every day
Many wearers find the Puma Ferrari Future Cat OG to be great-looking
cons: Quite a few users added that the Puma Ferrari Future Cat OG has a narrow fit
This model comes in limited color options

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, Defective, Uncomfortable...
customer_reviews.text: I own three other Puma Ferrari Future Cats from other sellers, purchased in excellent new condition. These shoes from this seller are defective; the cushion in the left shoe is too short, it does not extend all the way to the toe of the shoe. Leaving the toes to hang over the cushion in the shoe... making the shoe uncomfortable. I paid $131.30 for these defective Puma sneakers. The style looks great, but means nothing when the expensive shoes are defective and uncomfortable. I'm awaiting the sellers response. Unhappy and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shon

customer_reviews.title: Street shoe size and the tens are right on the money for me.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of promos that I’ve picked up through Amazon. Although I am purchased three different models they’ve all been 100% perfect. A little on the snug side as I like them. I wear a 9 1/2 or 10 Street shoe size and the tens are right on the money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs very narrow and small
customer_reviews.text: Already bought it a half size larger than their other sneakers, yet it is still small. Also these shoes are very narrow. I recommend you buy at least a full size larger and if your kid has wide feet, don't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald van Veen

customer_reviews.title: Run very small
customer_reviews.text: These run very small. I went asize higher and they are still way narrow. Nice looking shoe, just need to make them for a wider foot
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Cool Retro Look
customer_reviews.text: Be sure you TRIPLE-CHECK your size❗️ Items from this manufacturer (Puma) run small and narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Mixhael

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but very narrow
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. Dont buy unless you have narrow feet tho. Also, they don't seem sturdy. They're not made to be an everyday shoe.
customer_reviews.author: L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Get noticed for causal and gym
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. It upped the game for my gym gear, and I have worn them out as well!
customer_reviews.author: Mac McConnachie

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes. They feel and fit nicely. If you have worn Pumas in the past then you know exactly how they will fit.
customer_reviews.author: LexRace

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: One was slightly tighter than the other but after wearing a few days, it's all good. Would gave given another start if they fit better. They LOOK GREAT though
customer_reviews.author: JLK

customer_reviews.title: Fit too tight
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing, but be aware that you should buy 1/2 size more, I'm 9 an they fitted too tight in that size changed to 9.1/2 now it's perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Frank Castle

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the design, but the shoe runs 1 us size smaller .
customer_reviews.author: Chester Rider

customer_reviews.title: I am not happy, because I can not exchange because I live ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 12 US size, I bought the 12 size of this model, but it turned out to be small on me and narrow. The length of the insole is 29 cm, not 30 as indicated on the box. I am not happy, because I can not exchange because I live in another country. In general, the model is good.
customer_reviews.author: Dmytro Kalifat

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes and wears it for every occasion outside of work!
customer_reviews.author: Anna R

customer_reviews.title: Live in New Zealand so took a punt on size Elected to go half a size up from normal and my feet still feel like two fat ladies in corsets
customer_reviews.text: What is it with puma sizing! Live in New Zealand so took a punt on size Elected to go half a size up from normal and my feet still feel like two fat ladies in corsets. That said, they are slowly stretching and look cool so 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This shoe i ordered for a friend and he love it .
customer_reviews.author: AnaekweIkechukwu

customer_reviews.title: great gift and smart shoes
customer_reviews.text: slightly tight at the toe but the shoe opens up as you continue to wear it
customer_reviews.author: chandrika

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, but expensive! Bring down the price a bit, maybe below $80
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... pairs of this style puma and they all fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I have three other pairs of this style puma and they all fit like a glove. This pair was just too bulky and somewhat tight.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P.

customer_reviews.title: ... are always too narrow stretched these they are real nice
customer_reviews.text: Pumas are always too narrow stretched these they are real nice
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: It runs a half a size small.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half a size large and it fits great. I really like the red color.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: Received a great product, materials are looking little different than other ...
customer_reviews.text: Received a great product, materials are looking little different than other puma ferrari I've got (like more rigid and dry) but can even be good for durability. I liked the sneakers very much but I received them with my own luckily small collection of termits (opened on the bed!, passed a couple of hours cleaning & looking everywhere and inside them), thus, the four stars. Interesting experience :/
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Daniel Hernandez Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoe. Look sharp and feel great. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Other wise good shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is real narrow ! Other wise good shoe !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Ferrari Future Cat Og Sneaker
product_meta.description: The SF Future Cat OG is the most iconic lifestyle driving shoe within the PUMA motorsport range.. It has a fully leather upper with asymmetrical lacing to provide optimal fit. It has a fully rubber outsole with a rounded driver's heel and a low profile execution for a low to the ground feel. This shoe has an embroidered cat on the toe and the iconic embroidered cat on the medial side.
